com.mysql.jdbc

Class FailoverConnectionProxy.FailoverJdbcInterfaceProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mysql.jdbc.MultiHostConnectionProxy.JdbcInterfaceProxy
      • com.mysql.jdbc.FailoverConnectionProxy.FailoverJdbcInterfaceProxy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.reflect.InvocationHandler
    Enclosing class:
    FailoverConnectionProxy

     class FailoverConnectionProxy.FailoverJdbcInterfaceProxy
extends MultiHostConnectionProxy.JdbcInterfaceProxy
    Proxy class to intercept and deal with errors that may occur in any object bound to the current connection. Additionally intercepts query executions and triggers an execution count on the outer class.
